title: OpenBSD's pdksh on OSX
body:
Here is a diff to make OpenBSD's (5.3) pdksh work on OSX.

It requires homebrew, as well as bsdmake to be installed.

To Install:
  1. untar the tarball
  2. apply patch
  3. bsdmake
  4. cp ksh /bin/ksh
author: Aaron Bieber
